amendment.description: To make minor changes in the plan to provide a monthly allotment of free telephone calling time to members of the United States armed forces stationed outside the United States who are directly supporting military operations in Iraq or Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S4615-4616; text: CR S4616) To make minor changes in the plan to provide a monthly allotment of free telephone calling time to members of the United States armed forces stationed outside the United States who are directly supporting military operations in Iraq or Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
